tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE alarm_triggers (
  trigger_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id UUID NOT NULL,
  trigger_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE alarm_triggers ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, incident_id INT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE incidents ( incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(255), severity INT, description TEXT );

CREATE TABLE alarm_triggers (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE incident_response (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT NOT NULL,
  response_team VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE incident_details (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  severity VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE incident_resolution (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT NOT NULL,
  resolution TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
